answer: Your fatigue pattern likely improves most from sleep regularity and stress downshifts.
rationale_bullets: Sleep timing inconsistency can reduce next-day energy.
Stress load can blunt recovery and focus.
Small evening routines usually improve sleep quality quickly.

recommended_actions.title: 7-day recovery reset
steps: Anchor wake time within 30 minutes daily.
Track morning energy score each day.

recommended_actions.title: Stress downshift
steps: End work with a short shutdown checklist.

suggested_questions: Want a simple evening routine checklist?
Want help choosing one fatigue metric to track?
